casebody.data:
CHASE MANHATTAN MORTGAGE CORPORATION v. MANUEL MACHADO ET AL. (AC 25914)

Dranginis, Gruendel and Harper, Js.

Argued October 17 officially released November 1, 2005 Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting a new sale date and issuing any incidental orders in furtherance of that sale.
